participant_1.name: Angela
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and sociable, enjoys sharing experiences and connecting with others.
participant_1.background: I've amazing children and grandchildren. I had cancer but it's gone now. I can sew my own clothes. I am retired and living the great life.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Friendly and enthusiastic, loves celebrating life and spending time with friends.
participant_2.background: I am 24 years old. I love eating out with friends. I'm getting married in the spring. My favorite singer is Taylor Swift.
